text: Jay - Z released his highly anticipated album 4 : 44 and if you ’ re a Tidal member, you can stream it right now below. Hov ’ s new LP features Frank Ocean and Damian Marley. The entire project is produced by by No I. D. There ’ s no word on when, if at all, 4 : 44 will be available on iTunes. JAY - Z 4 : 44 OFFICIAL ALBUM TRACKLIST 01. KILL JAY Z 02. THE STORY OF O. J. 03. SMILE ( FEATURING GLORIA CARTER ) 04. CAUGHT THEIR EYES ( FEATURING FRANK OCEAN ) 05. 4 : 44 06.
